mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.password AS "password", a.address AS "address", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM debug_user a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO debug_user( id, name, password, address, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{address}, #{remarks} )
